GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v4.14.233
GSD.description:
ARM: 9064/1: hw_breakpoint: Do not directly check the event's overflow_handler hook

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.233 by commit ed1f67465327cec4457bb988775245b199da86e6, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 1879445dfa7bbd6fe21b09c5cc72f4934798afed. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: 9064/1: hw_breakpoint: Do not directly check the event's overflow_handler hook
